name: Dawngate
summary: Dawngate is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed by Waystone Games and published by Electronic Arts for Microsoft Windows. It will be a free-to-play game which is likely to be supported by micro-transactions. News about the game began to leak during early-mid April 2013 with few details on mechanics, gameplay, or other elements. It has not yet been announced when the game will open;the closed beta testing period began on May 24, 2013, and the community beta was released on April 9, 2014. The open beta was released on May 19, 2014
info:
• 中文名: 黎明之门
